name: Glimpse of Unreal
description:
Glimpse of Unreal is a short game in which player has to get to the portal at the end of each level. Even though the goal is not complicated, the task itself is not that simple.  Every level is a puzzle containing optical illusions and encouraging to think outside the box. Remember, not everything you see is real!

Glimpse of Unreal was developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1, first game jam that author took part in.

Controls:

Move - Arrows / WASD

Jump - Space

Sprint - L. Shift
